channel.title: [PI base] Couple of problems
channel.description: Firstly, whenever someone goes into the lunar spellbook, their client freezes. Same when they talk to the wise old man (not all the time) Also whenever someone mages, they run towards their enemy making magic pointless, anyone got any ideas. I'm using PI base and exion source.
